articles.title: Netflix plans to launch its own video game studio - BBC
articles.description: Studio in Finland is the latest and clearest example of the streaming giant moving into gaming.
articles.content:
Netflix is setting up its own video game studio, as it intensifies its efforts to establish itself in the gaming industry.
